chunked_vad.lyrics_text: Huh, yeah, nah I just, had a lil' bit too much of Hennessy Just gotta tell you how I feel, look You so fuckin' precious when you smile (huh, yeah) Hit it from the back and drive you wild (yeah, yeah, yeah)
